_name: DeWalt 12V MAX XTREME 3/8 in. Brushless Cordless 5-In-1 Drill Kit (Battery & Charger)
What's Included: (1) DCD703 Xtreme 12V MAX 5-in-1 Drill/Driver, (1) 12V MAX DCB122 Battery (2.0Ah), (1) DCB112 Charger, (1) Kit Bag, (1) 3/8 in Chuck Attachment, (1) 1/4 in Hex Right Angle Attachment, (1) 1/4 in Hex Quick Release Attachment, (1) 1/4 in Hex Quick Release O
